title: Migrate Projects
descrip: Migrate project from the older 'project folder' format to the single '.bsp' file format
projectsParentDir: Select a folder that contains projects e.g.
additionalNote: NOTE 1: To migrate a single project select a single project folder
bNote: Note 2: Once successfully migrated, the project(s) will be added to the project dropdown list

help.title: Migrate Projects
help.body:
Description
Migrating projects will scan the folder for projects and add them to the dropdown.
